description: A small group of penguins stands huddled on a melting ice floe in the vast ocean, surrounded by emptiness. Their precarious isolation on this tiny island of ice underscores the potential for being alone in the universe, a subject one of them ponders. The absurd image of penguins discussing existential loneliness highlights the irony of seeking connection beyond their already isolated existence. This surreal juxtaposition of their vulnerable physical state and grand philosophical thought is notable.
caption: “On the other hand, what if we aren’t alone in the universe?”
